enWisdom: Understanding is a sign of knowledge
Knowledge is the herald of comprehension
One who seeks right guidance from knowledge, it guides him

Wisdom: مَا أَفَادَ الْعِلْمُ مَنْ لَمْ يَفْهَمْ [لَا يَعْلَمُ‏] وَلَا نَفَعَ الْحِلْمُ مَنْ لَمْ يَحْلُمْ
enWisdom: Knowledge does not benefit the one who does not understand [it] and forbearance is not useful for the one who does not show clemency
Delusion is not the same as comprehension
For people of understanding speech becomes figurative
One who possesses understanding does not become needy
One who tries to understand increases [his understanding]

Wisdom: إِنَّ النَّفْسَ حَمْضَةٌ وَالْأُذُنَ مَجَّاجَةٌ فَلَا تَجُبَّ فَهْمَكَ بِالْإِلْحَاحِ عَلَى قَلْبِكَ فَإِنَّ لِكُلِّ عُضْوٍ مِنَ الْبَدَنِ اسْتِرَاحَةً
enWisdom: Verily the soul is like the camel that likes to eat bitter grass, and the ear does not retain much of what it hears, so do not cut off your understanding by being importunate with your soul because for each part of the body there is [need for] repose
